page.title: 13 MAMMALS
page.content: In our area there are many species of mammals to look out for.Most of them live in the fields and woods. In Cann woods there are roe and fallow deer.Badgers live in the woods, but are usually seen on the side of the road as traffic casualties.Foxes are also mainly seen in Cann Woods. There are hedgehogs and squirrels in our area.They are fairly common and you can find them in gardens and in the woods.Stoats and weasels are present but aren't all that common because they are frightened of people. Rabbits are common on pasture land. Most of the common British rodents can be found in the area,water voles on the river,wood mice in the woods, house mice around buildings and field and bank voles in the hedges.
